sense.name: telecasting
sense.commentary: TV, video, television - broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects
sense.examples: She is a star of screen and video. "Television is a medium because it is neither rare nor well done." -Ernie Kovacs

sense.name: tv set
sense.commentary: television receiver, television, television set, idiot box, boob tube, goggle box - a receiver that displays television images
sense.examples: I'm off to the store to buy a tv. The British call a tv set a telly.
